movie.title: Cross Bronx
movie.description_intro: 4 New York City highschoolers upon moving into the Bronx together, discover it's not easy doing it on your own
movie.description_full: 4 New York City highschoolers upon moving into the Bronx together, discover it's not easy doing it on your own

movies.title: Maid of Honor
movies.summary: While driving in the road, Richard Wynn crashes his car and his beloved wife Carrie Wynn dies. Along two years, his sister-in-law Laci Collins moves to his house and helps Richard to raise his son Danny Wynn and his teenage daughter Molly Wynn. When Richard decides to get married with Nicole Harris, the deranged and psychotic Laci that is in love for Richard, tries to force Richard to call off the wedding with malevolence against Nicole and manipulating Danny.
movies.description_full: While driving in the road, Richard Wynn crashes his car and his beloved wife Carrie Wynn dies. movies.title: The Medic
movies.summary: The story is set in June 1983. Famous surgeon Jean-Marie Desprée was left by his wife 1 month ago and now he works in a modern movable hospital, where the 3rd world war is taking place.
movies.description_full: The story is set in June 1983. Famous surgeon Jean-Marie Desprée was left by his wife 1 month ago and now he works in a modern movable hospital, where the 3rd world war is taking place.

movies.title: Jimi: All Is by My Side
movies.title_english: Jimi: All Is by My Side
movies.title_long: Jimi: All Is by My Side (2013)
movies.summary: A drama based on Jimi Hendrix's life as he left New York City for London, where his career took off.
movies.description_full: A drama based on Jimi Hendrix's life as he left New York City for London, where his career took off.
movies.synopsis: A drama based on Jimi Hendrix's life as he left New York City for London, where his career took off.

movies.title: Silent House
movies.summary: Sarah as she and her dad go to their lakeside retreat to pack things up, as it's being sold. Her uncle also helps out.getting the place ready. When her uncle leaves to get an electrician to check the wiring, Sara hears noises sees what she believes are people inside the house. Soon, she and her dad are attacked by someone - or something, and they end up in a fight for their lives. But there's something more sinister going on.
